channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Spurs coach Gregg Popovich had a stroke earlier this month
item.description: Basketball Hall of Famer Gregg Popovich has been away from the team because he suffered a mild stroke earlier this month, the San Antonio Spurs announced Wednesday.

item.title: Larry Hobbs, who guided AP’s coverage of Florida news for decades, has died at 83
item.description: Robert Larry Hobbs, an Associated Press editor who guided Florida news coverage for more than three decades, has died. He was 83.

item.title: Gun groups sue to overturn Maine’s new three-day waiting period to buy firearms
item.description: Several gun groups are challenging Maine’s 72-hour waiting period for gun purchases, arguing that it’s unconstitutional.
